page.title: 08LIFE IN DEPDEN - GENERAL
page.content: I live with my husband, a builder, and four children Jason aged 14, Jonathan 12, Sallyanne 6 3/4 and Roy 4 in the village of Depden. Depden has no shop, post office, school village hall or pub only a church known as the' church in the fields' as there is no road access to it, only a footpath. We rely on the surrounding villages for shops and recreation facilites. The nearest primary school is in Chedburgh and the middle and senior schools in Bury. This means my three oldest children have to travel to school by bus. In order to take advantage of the amentities in the surrounding area your own transport is a necessity.
